attributes.action: Change the ruling that only asylum seekers that have served a sentence of 12 months or more should be deported
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We requested that Gordon Brown changes the ruling that asylum seekers who break the law can only be deported if they have been given a sentence of 12 months or more, each case should be looked at individually, as offenders of more serious crimes are getting away with light sentences and are allowed to remain in the UK to re-offend, even though asylum has been rejected

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to change the ruling that only asylum seekers that have served a sentence of 12 months or more should be deported.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=Simonlawrence


Her Majesty's Government
